import React from 'react' import {startGetUser} from '../../actions/userAction' import {connect} from 'react-redux' class CustomerInfo extends React.Component { constructor(){ super() this.state = { firstname:'', lastName:'', address:'', phno:'', email:'', gender:'', infoEdit:true } } componentDidMount =()=>{ this.props.dispatch(startGetUser()) const refersh = setInterval( () =>{ if(this.props.users.length !==0 ) { clearInterval(refersh) const user = this.props.users[0] this.setState({ firstname:this.props.user.firstname, lastName:this.props.user.lastName, address:this.props.user.address, phno:this.props.user.mobile, email:this.props.user.email }) } } , 1000) } handleInfoEdit = () => { this.setState( {infoEdit:false}) } render(){ console.log(this.state.firstname) return(
